name: ECOSC
description: Imagine a world with a simplified version of the supply chain process. Imagine business transactions being recorded, processes and validated digitally without the need for many third parties and intermediaries. Imagine the time which will be saved, the cost efficiency, the transaction speed, and the increased cash flow due to such autonomous system. Such a system will reduce a whole lot of complexity from the current sophisticated supply chain model in the oil and gas industry, and it will bring an edge to Majors & NOCs who adopt such solutions against their competition.
